If you have trained Cross Punch, Brawl will also reduce the target's regeneration and recovery. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_Jump_Pack_Temp

powers.display_help: You are a true Iron Man. You persistence and stamina have resulted in your Max Hit Points and Max Endurance increasing by 10%.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_Permanent_Undead_Slaying_Axe

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_Permanent_Nemesis_Staff

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_Permanent_Sands_of_Mu

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_Permanent_Blackwand
powers.display_help: This black metal wand feels cold in your hand, and glows with dark arcane energies. When used by Magic, Mutant or Natural origin individuals, the potency of its attacks are increased. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to Blackwand. Damage: Moderate

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_Team_Recall
powers.display_help: This power allows you to teleport all of your teammates to your location.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_SelfRez
powers.display_help: If you are defeated, you may return to battle empowered by the effects of several types of large inspirations! After each use, you may not use this effect again for another hour.
powers.display_short_help: Self Rez, Debt Protection, +Large Inspiration Effects

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Renewal_of_Light
powers.display_help: A guardian spirit watches over you. If you are defeated, activating this power will restore you so you may continue the battle. The restoration blasts nearby foes with an explosion, knocking them down and Disorienting them. You will revive with about half of your Hit Points and Endurance. You will be invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.SnowBall
powers.display_help: Can be used on friend and foe alike. Although there are no lasting effects when these frozen missiles are hurled, who doesn't love throwing a snowball. Happy Holidays!

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Mini_SnowBeast
powers.display_help: You can use this power to create a solidified hologram of a Mini SnowBeast. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Vanguard_MVAS
powers.display_help: You can use this power to summon a miniature replica of a Vanguard HVAS. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_InspirationGrant
powers.display_help: You can look deep within yourself to find the inspiration necessary to overcome any obstacle. Using this power will award the player with 3 inspirations. Once used, you will be prevented from using this power again for 30 minutes.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Target:LKT-1700_Rocket_Pack
powers.display_help: Delusion, Inc., the same company that makes all of Rose Star's gadgets, has mass-produced the LKT-1700 ducted-fan jet pack. This stylish jet pack endows you with the power of Flight.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.LKT_Remover
powers.display_help: Removes the LKT Rocket Pack when the Auth Bit expires.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_Permanent_SelfDestruction
powers.display_help: You explode! In doing so, you create a massive explosion which deals extreme damage to all foes in a large radius. Damage: Extreme
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing/Fire), Foe KB, Self Kill

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Mystic_Fortune
powers.display_help: You can read the fortune of any player. This grants a random permanent buff for 20 minutes, and they may not have their fortune read again during that time.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Secondary_Mutation
powers.display_help: You acquire a secondary mutation. This grants a random permanent buff for up to 20 minutes. No more than one Secondary Mutation can be in place at a time.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_reveal
powers.display_help: Your extensive knowledge of your surroundings will allow you to clear the "Fog of War" from any map once every 5 minutes.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Alt_Frisbee_Granter
powers.display_help: Use this power to throw a Flying Disc to a friend! This will grant them a use of the Flying Disc power. You have an infinite number of Flying Discs that can be thrown to friends, although friends can only have 1 copy of the Flying Disc power at a time.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Shadowy_Presence
powers.display_help: Activating this power shifts you into a semi-real shadow-state. So long as you are not attacked and remain motionless, you will have extremely good stealth rating and be nearly invisible. This power has a long, interruptible cast time and always takes 5 minutes to recharge. This power provides no benefit in PvP or in PvP zones.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Sprint
powers.display_help: Sprint allows you to travel, or run away, slightly faster than normal, while slightly draining your Endurance.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Vision_Phase
powers.display_help: Special

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Energy_Flight
powers.display_help: Energy Flight allows you to travel large distances quickly. If you attack a target while this power is on, your flight speed will be temporarily reduced. Your Energy Flight speed increases with your Level.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Cosmic_Balance
powers.display_help: Kheldians naturally thrive off the energy and essence of their teammates. Peacebringers' metamorphic nature allows them to bring balance to their team. Your Damage will increase for each nearby Tanker, Mastermind, Corruptor or Defender teammate. Your Damage Resistance will increase for each nearby Scrapper, Brute, Stalker or Blaster teammate. Each nearby Controller or Dominator teammate will grant you limited Protection from Control effects. Finally, each nearby Peacebringer, Warshade, or teamed Arachnos Soldier or Widow grants you some resistance to attack time slow effects. You cannot put Enhancements in this power.

requires: (((target>arch == Arachnos Soldier) || (target>arch == Arachnos Widow)) || (target>arch == Peacebringer)) || (target>arch == Warshade)

display_info: 10.00% resistance to recharge debuff for 10s on self

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Shadow_Step
powers.display_help: You can Teleport long distances. Shadow Step has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Dark_Sustenance
powers.display_help: Kheldians naturally thrive off the energy and essence of their teammates. Warshades' absorbing nature allows them to draw on the power of their teammates' power to increase their own. Your Damage Resistance will increase for each nearby Tanker, Mastermind, Corruptor or Defender teammate. Your Damage will increase for each nearby Scrapper, Stalker, Brute or Blaster teammate. Each nearby Controller or Dominator teammate will grant you limited Protection from Control effects. Finally, each nearby Peacebringer, Warshade, or teamed Arachnos Soldier or Widow grants you some resistance to attack time slow effects. You cannot put Enhancements in this power.

requires: (((target>arch == Arachnos Soldier) || (target>arch == Arachnos Widow)) || (target>arch == Peacebringer)) || (target>arch == Warshade)

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Defiance
powers.display_help: Blasters' earliest abilities come so naturally to them, that they are accessible even in states that normally prevent them from using powers, such as being Held, Slept or Stunned. Additionally, each time the Blaster attacks with a primary or secondary power, they gain a stacking damage bonus for the next 7.5 seconds. The amount of the damage bonus is dependent on the exact power used, with single target abilities generally giving the largest bonus.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Defiance_Dampen
powers.display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Supremacy
powers.display_help: A good Mastermind knows how to manage his Henchmen. The Mastermind imparts a bonus to his Henchmen's Accuracy and Damage only if he is nearby and not Phased or otherwise can only use Self Only powers. Additionally, your Henchmen within range in Defensive mode will share damage with the Mastermind, with damage being divided evenly between the Mastermind and each one of his Henchmen in range.

display_info: 25.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on target

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Scourge
powers.display_help: The Corruptor is a dastardly villain indeed. As a Corruptor's foe health wanes, the Corruptor can start to land Scourge Hits with his attack powers for up to Double Damage. The weaker the target is, the greater chance the Corruptor has on landing Scourge. Once a foe is weak enough, there is no escaping the Corruptors wrath. The Corruptor shows no mercy.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Critical_Hit
powers.display_help: The Scrapper is a fierce melee combatant. In hand to hand, no other hero can compare. All Scrapper melee attacks have a chance to land a Critical Hit for up to Double Damage. The higher the rank of the target, the greater the chance for a successful Critical Hit.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Assassination
powers.display_help: A Stalker does his best work when attacking from ambush. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. Assassin Strikes made from hide will Demoralize the Stalker's foes leaving them with a reduced chance to hit and has a chance to terrorize them. Additionally, a Stalker has a 10 percent base chance to critically hit, which is increased by an additional 3 percent per member in your party, against non-player enemies. Stalkers have a chance to land a critical hit against players if they are Held or Slept. Each of the Stalker's damaging powers within their primary power set, other than Assassin's Strike, have a chance to grant the Stalker a stack of Assassin's Focus. Each stack of this buff boosts Assassin's Strike's chance to critically (hit while the user is not hidden) by 33.3%. Assassin's Focus stacks up to 3 times.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Containment
powers.display_help: Controllers are the masters at locking down and controlling their opponents. Few can escape their will. Controllers do extra damage to any target that is already Held, Immobilized, Slept, or Disoriented.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Scrutiny
powers.display_help: By carefully striking at their foes, Sentinels work towards creating opportunistic attacks that can weaken their foes or grant themselves a chance to recoup. Any enemy that a Sentinel focuses attacks on will be easier to hit and will suffer an additional 5% damage from incoming attacks. Multiple Sentinels can work together to make this effect stronger. Occasionally, the Sentinel may find an extreme vulnerability in a target that can be exploited to deliver up to 25% additional damage against it for a limited time. Only one such extreme vulnerability may be exploited at a time.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Scrutiny_Meter
powers.display_help: By carefully striking at their foes, Sentinels work towards creating opportunistic attacks that can weaken their foes or grant themselves a chance to recoup. Any enemy that a Sentinel focuses attacks on will be easier to hit and will suffer an additional 5% damage from incoming attacks. Multiple Sentinels can work together to make this effect stronger. Occasionally, the Sentinel may find an extreme vulnerability in a target that can be exploited to deliver up to 25% additional damage against it for a limited time. Only one such extreme vulnerability may be exploited at a time.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Gauntlet
powers.display_help: Although many may try, few can withstand the irresistible force of the Tanker. Each time a Tanker attacks, he enrages the target, and those around him, enticing them to attack the Tanker. Each punch continues to provoke your enemies and allows the Tanker to do what he does best. In addition, the area of your AoE attacks will be buffed. Cones will become wider, spheres larger, and chains reach further away.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Vigilance
powers.display_help: The Defender's primary focus is to protect the team. When his allies are in danger, the Defender is able to look deep within him or herself and rise to the occasion. As a Defender's teammates are in danger of being defeated, the Defender gains an Endurance Discount and can activate their powers at a reduced cost. The more teammates in trouble, the greater the discount. A defender on a small team or by himself has more freedom to concentrate on his enemies, which allows him to increase his damage output by up to 30%. Each team member reduces this by 10%, to a minimum of no buff at all.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Domination_Rage
powers.display_help: Nothing delights a Dominator more than inflicting pain. Each time a Dominator attacks, their sadistic nature grows. When your Domination bar is over 90%, you can activate this power to unleash their true potential. Your control powers will typically last 50 percent longer and will more easily Dominate stronger opponents. Additionally, you will fully recharge your Endurance and gain resistance to status protection.

powers.display_help: While engaged in combat, Devoured become filled with endorphins and adrenaline, fueling their attacks and combat lust. Each time they attack or are attacked, they gain a bonus to attack damage.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.HAC__Standard
powers.display_help: Hyper-Advanced Clockwork have three modes of Operation: Standard, Offensive Mode or Defensive Mode. These are controlled by a pair of Toggle powers. When neither is engaged, the HAC uses standard modifiers, which favor Buff, Debuff and Movement powers. If the Offense Mode toggle is engaged, then the focus shifts, becoming weaker to Buff, Debuff and Movement values, but Recharge, To Hit and Damage are increased. In Defensive Mode, the ATmods shift, becoming weaker to Buff, Debuff and Movement values, but stronger to Damage Resistances, Status changes and Regeneration. HAC's are harder to heal and are vulnerable to Electro-Magnetic effects.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.HAC_Rez
powers.display_help: If you are defeated , you activating this power which will restore you so you may continue the battle. You will revive with about half of your Hit Points and Endurance. You will be invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds. Note that System Reboot is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Extremely Long

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Primal_Energy_Dampen
powers.display_help: You gain Primal Energy by using your Feral Might attack powers, however you lose 1 Primal Energy every 6 seconds.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Primal_Energy_Meter
powers.display_help: Many of the Primalist's Attacks will grant you Primal Energy. This energy is spent to execute devastating attacks and debuffs as well as incredibly potent healing. It's important to note that some powers require 10 Primal Energy to activate while others will scale with the amount you have.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Alt_Hover_Board
powers.display_help: You mount a Rocket Board allowing you to fly at great speeds. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation. This power also grants the you a measure of flight protection making you less likely to be knocked out of the sky by some enemy attacks.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Alt_Magic_Carpet
powers.display_help: You hop aboard a flying carpet allowing you to fly around with tremendous speed. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation. This power also grants the you a measure of flight protection making you less likely to be knocked out of the sky by some enemy attacks.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Alt_Void_Skiff
powers.display_help: You mount a Void Skiff allowing you to fly at great speeds. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation. This power also grants the you a measure of flight protection making you less likely to be knocked out of the sky by some enemy attacks.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Walk
powers.display_help: Activating this power enables you to walk at a relaxed pace. You will not be able to activate most powers while walking.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Rest
powers.display_help: Activate Rest to heal Hit Points and recover Endurance. While Resting you cannot attack, and you are extremely vulnerable to attack and damage. Activation of Rest can be interrupted, and the power must be active for a few seconds before you start to recuperate. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Fitness_Fix
powers.display_help: You recover Endurance slightly more quickly than normal. This ability is always on and does not cost any Endurance. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Fitness Powers before selecting Stamina.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_Pocket_D_VIP_Pass
powers.display_help: You've been given a VIP Pass to Pocket D. It will allow you to access Pocket D from anywhere. It is usable once every 30 minutes.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_Base_Teleport
powers.display_help: You have a Base Transport beacon. It will allow you to return to your base from any location. It is usable once every 30 minutes.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.prestige_Mission_Teleport
powers.display_help: You have a Mission Transport beacon. It will allow you to teleport to your active mission's entrance.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Team_Transporter
powers.display_help: Activating this power will summon a vehicle that will allow your party to teleport to the active mission. This power cannot be activated while on a PvP or mission map.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Prestige_Ninja_Run
powers.display_help: A combination of quickness and acrobatic grace, Ninja Run allows you to move at high speed, whether on the ground or leaping from rooftop to rooftop. This power is not as fast as Super Speed, nor will it allow you to jump as well as Super Leap, however it is considerably better than the Fitness powers Swift and Hurdle.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Prestige_Beast_Run
powers.display_help: Show off your bestial nature by using this power. This power is not as fast as Super Speed, nor will it allow you to jump as well as Super Leap, however it is considerably better than the Fitness powers Swift and Hurdle.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Prestige_Steam_Jump
powers.display_help: Your steam powered jump pack grants you the ability to not only jump great distances, but also jump and gain altitude in mid air! The steam powered jump pack will automatically shut down after 30 seconds of continuous use.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Alt_Coyote_Travel_Power
powers.display_help: You transform into a coyote granting you increased movement speed and jump height. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Alt_Cheetah_Travel_Power
powers.display_help: You transform into a cheetah granting you greatly increased movement speed and a slight increase to jump height. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Alt_Panther_Travel_Power
powers.display_help: You transform into a Panther granting you increased movement speed and a slight boost to your jump height. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Combat_Flight
powers.display_help: For hovering and aerial combat. This power is much slower than Energy Flight, but provides some Defense, offers good air control, costs little Endurance, and has none of the penalties associated with Energy Flight. Switch to this mode when fighting other flying foes.

powers.name: Inherent.Inherent.Shadow_Recall
powers.display_help: You can Teleport one of your teammates to yourself. The target must be a teammate or leaguemate and can be selected from the Team Window. You can also rescue a fallen teammate who may be in a hostile location, as long as he is on the same map. Range is not infinite, but extremely long and can be enhanced. This power can be interrupted. Recharge: Fast
